heroTitle: Find the perfect accommodation or rent out your property
heroDescription: We bring tenants and landlords together – fast, easy and reliable in Hamburg & Schleswig-Holstein.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: We are a dedicated team from Hamburg specializing in the placement of furnished apartments for companies. Our goal is to make the search for employee accommodations as easy and efficient as possible.
about.missionText: We believe that every company should have access to suitable accommodations for their employees – uncomplicated, reliable, and local.
